description: Beefy Darin Silvers and athletic Justin Matthews are sitting in class quietly working on homework. They break the silence to talk and brown-haired Justin explains what he did to get in trouble. Tattooed stud Darin is shocked that all he got was detention so he grabs ahold of Justin bends him over the teacher’s desk and spanks his ass. Darin tells him he’s giving him the punishment he deserves and Justin likes it so much that he asks him to do it again.
title: The Disciplinarian
